title: DISNEY KINGDOMS: SEEKERS OF THE WEIRD (2014) #1
description: AN ALL-NEW ADVENTURE INSPIRED BY DISNEY'S LEGENDARY BUT NEVER BUILT MUSEUM OF THE WEIRD! When their parents are kidnapped, teens Maxwell and Melody are thrust into a thrilling race through the world's most strange and dangerous museum as they unite with their mysterious and swashbuckling uncle to save their family and the world from an evil secret society! Envisioned by famous Walt Disney Imagineer Rolly Crump for Walt Disney in 1965, the Museum of the Weird's innovative designs were left on Crump's drawing board…until now! Brought to you by writer Brandon Seifert (Witch Doctor), artist Karl Moline (AVENGERS ARENA) and Shuster Award-winning cover artist Mike Del Mundo!

textObjects.text: AN ALL-NEW ADVENTURE INSPIRED BY DISNEY'S LEGENDARY BUT NEVER BUILT MUSEUM OF THE WEIRD! When their parents are kidnapped, teens Maxwell and Melody are thrust into a thrilling race through the world's most strange and dangerous museum as they unite with their mysterious and swashbuckling uncle to save their family and the world from an evil secret society! Envisioned by famous Walt Disney Imagineer Rolly Crump for Walt Disney in 1965, the Museum of the Weird's innovative designs were left on Crump's drawing board…until now! Brought to you by writer Brandon Seifert (Witch Doctor), artist Karl Moline (AVENGERS ARENA) and Shuster Award-winning cover artist Mike Del Mundo!
